001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
004
005/**
006 * Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.
007 */
008public interface LearningRateConfigurable extends HyperparameterConfigurable {
009
010    /** The hyperparameter name for learning rate. */
011    String HP_LEARNING_RATE = "learningRate";
012
013    /**
014     * Returns the current learning rate (step size).
015     *
016     * @return the learning rate value
017     */
018    default float getLearningRate() {
019        return getHyperparameter(HP_LEARNING_RATE, Float.class);
020    }
021
022    /**
023     * Sets the learning rate (step size).
024     *
025     * @param learningRate the new learning rate (must be > 0)
026     */
027    default void setLearningRate(float learningRate) {
028        setHyperparameter(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
029    }
030}
